name: BVN Satellite
author: Thomas Winter

sections.description:
Satellite to the BVN.ch API This Satellite (https://wordpress.org/plugins/bvn-satellite/‎) provides widgets to
WordPress. Multiple instances are supported. Backend configuration available. The SDK is currently under
development, so functions, readme and/or examples will change. If other views are required, I’ll try to add
them in. Feel free to mail me and request your tell me your needs!
sections.installation:
1. Upload the zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory or download it from the repository
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Use the Admin Panel to select the Club you want to use the plugin for.

  4. Add Widgets to the pages of your choice to display ranking or matches. All necessary parameters can be
    provided in the widget backend.

    Additional use of plug-in “widget-logic” for different rankings on different pages with same templates is highly recommended.
sections.faq:
Where is a running example?

A running example can be found under http://www.bcm-basket.ch

Who can help me with the plugin?

Just send me a mail to th.winter@gmail.com
sections.changelog:
1.7

  • adapting to changes made in the API after Basketplan introduction

1.6

  • Bug fix / Removes error when no data is supplied to object

1.5

  • Bug fix

1.4.1

  • Bug fix

1.4

  • Panel revision, minor optimisations
  • adding title option to widgets
  • changing back end layout to use less space in widget definition
  • showing gym name in view of upcoming games

1.3

  • Added the option of limiting the games to the matches view

1.2

  • First published plugin

short_description: Satellite to the BVN.ch API This Satellite provides widgets to display game schedules and rankings to WordPress.
